thread.title: Royals rally, beat Astros 5-4 to even ALDS at 1 game each
thread.title_full: Royals rally, beat Astros 5-4 to even ALDS at 1 game each

title: Royals rally, beat Astros 5-4 to even ALDS at 1 game each
text:
> Texas Royals rally, beat Astros 5-4 to even ALDS at 1 game each Houston Astros relief pitcher Oliver Perez throws a pitch during the sixth inning of Game 2 in baseball's American League Division Series against the Kansas City Royals, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015, in Kansas City, Mo. (AP Photo/Charlie Riedel)
